cause.description:
Wolves are one of the most noble creatures, however very few can survive in the wild due to man and the predjudice towards these beautiful animals. I want to educate the world about these majestic creatures.
1. Wolves should be able to roam free.
2. Wolves should not be shot.
cause.mission: protect these noble creatures that embody the spirit of freedom and power.
cause.name: Save the Wolves
